segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The daylight is coming through a window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman is standing there, drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is completely on the dish in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing, water is just pouring out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a puddle on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her shoes is already submerged in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed this significant mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is sheeting down the cabinet doors, it's quite a lot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is definitely on, full blast it seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so oblivious to what's happening right there?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks so peaceful and orderly through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is truly an unusual sight.
segments.speaker: PAR
